titleStmt.title: Letter from Mrs. William Schuette to John G. Neihardt, Febuary 4, 1970
titleStmt.author: Mrs. Schuette, William

publicationStmt.authority: The Papers of John G. Neihardt

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: >Letter from Mrs. William Schuette to John G. Neihardt, Febuary 4, 1970

msIdentifier.repository: John G. Neihardt Center Research Library, Aly Collection

div1.fw: MRS. WILLIAM SCHUETTE ROUTE CHAPMAN, NEBRASKA 68827
div1.p: Our "Lutheran Church Women Executive Board wish to congratulate you upon your recent birthday. We also say "thank you" for the Contributions you have made in our state. We feel that you have influenced many lives.
Many of us saw you on television and felt you gave some very good answers to the questions that were asked of you.
"thank you" and may you have many happy days in the future.

closer.fw: Nebraska Lutheran Church Women of The Lutheran Church In America Executive Board

Peggy Nelson (Mrs. Harvey) Potter Anita Regler (Mrs. Jerry) Nebr. City Betty Heier (Mrs. Darrel) Wayne Lorraine Setterlund (Mrs. H.V.) Omaha Ruth H. Rustine (Mrs. DA) Lincoln Andy Grimm (Mrs. Arthur) Chappell Adeline Bernhardson Pender, Nebraska Amy Stran Holdrege, Nebr. Nadine Meier (Mrs. Eldon) Nickerson, Nebr. Lois Bernson (Mrs. Meloin) Dakota City, Nebr. Helire Gross (Mrs. Cash) Rising CIty, Nebr. Alta Vaudenberge (Mrs. Kenneth) West Point, Nebr. Caroline High, Bertrand, Nebr. Donna Anderson (Mrs. Richard) - Stromburg, Nebr. Dorothy Decker (Mrs. Edgar) Lincoln, Nebr. Lenous Schuette (Mrs. William) Chapman, Nebr. Louise Vanzogo - Omaha, Nebr. Evely Larson Hastings, Nebr.
